channel.title: Hi, Question about rs2 servers
channel.description:
Server Help?
I am from the rsc section of the forums :p and interested in rs2. So I am wondering when it comes to rs2 servers what is the difference with the sources? Which one is the best? Which one is the worst?

item.title: Hi, Question about rs2 servers
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:5, topic:295496”][quote author=bbl111 link=topic=391497.msg2915660#msg2915660 date=1250386915]
I think RSC servers are a lot simpler than RS2 servers, if you wish to switch to RS2 servers, I suggest a Delta base because they are stable and good for beginner coders.
[/quote]

I wont be a beginner coder like most people coming into rs2.[/quote]
Don’t use the DeltaScape source code, it’s the dump of efficient programing.

Use something that clean and stable. Like Grahams newest framework, but if don’t want to get that in depth use something like iClarity.

Read full topic

only thing is, Delta is Dupe Central.
